question: Is there any support organizations that a person can talk to to learn how to cope with a massive brain clot that is in operable?  The clot starts at the base of the back of the head and wraps around the left side of the head around the ear and to the top of the head.  Shands at Gainesville FL is treating the clot with cumedin and various other drugs.  My daughter also has diabetes and high blood pressure and is over weight.  She has lost 77 lbs since this thing started in December '07.  Just need to know if any one else has come up against something like this.Thank you.Mama Cassd
title: Massive Blood Clot on the Brain
